des: "I use cacao nibs (low-carb roasted and coarsely ground cocoa beans) for my morning oatmeal. You can get them online or in select health food stores."
ins: Combine quinoa, oats, flaked coconut, cacao nibs, and molasses in a pot; cover with water. Bring to a boil and cover. Reduce heat and simmer until quinoa and oats are soft, 10 to 15 minutes. Add more water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if oatmeal becomes too dry.
